Head of Antiquities, Zahi Hawass said on state television that it was not known if anything was stolen from the museum. There needs to be tighter security around the museum and fire trucks on standby. The museum can be set ablaze. Report Abuse I sincerely hope the Egyptian people eventually will win their freedom. However, the Cairo museum is one of the world's greatest museums. It's artifacts are beyond price. They are the cultural heritage of the Egyptian people representing one of the world's earliest and greatest civilizations. It would be a tragedy for Egypt and it's people if the Cairo Museum were looted and trashed like the Bagdad Museum. Report Abuse " Headline: "Egypt's museums and monuments are deserted" "
